name: Intuitive
description: Intuitive is mostly famous for the Da Vinci platform.

name: Medtronic
description: Medtronic is a medical device company with operational headquarters in Minneapolis, Minnesota, and legal headquarters in Ireland. They offer a robotic-assisted surgery system called Hugo RAS.

name: Medicaroid
description: Medicaroid is a Japanese company based in Kobe, known for its Hinotori robotic surgical system.

name: CMR Surgical
description: CMR Surgical is a British medical device company based in Cambridge, producing the Versius robot-assisted surgery system.

name: SSII
description: SSII (SS Innovations International, Inc.) is an Indian company based in Gurugram, known for its SSi Mantra surgical robotic system.

name: Cornerstone Robotics
description: Cornerstone Robotics is a Chinese company based in Shenzhen, developing medical robotic devices like Sentire.

name: Moon Surgical
description: Moon Surgical is a medical device company with bases in Paris, France, and San Carlos, California, developing the Maestro surgical robot for laparoscopy assistance.

name: Revolve Surgical
description: Revolve Surgical is a Canadian company based in Toronto, developing surgical robots like the R1.

name: Vicarious Surgical Inc
description: Vicarious Surgical Inc. is a US-based company in Waltham, Massachusetts, known for its single-port robotic surgical system.

name: Asensus Surgical
description: Asensus Surgical is a US-based medical device company in Durham, North Carolina, engaged in the research, development, and sale of medical device robotics to enhance minimally invasive surgery, including the Senhance and LUNA systems.

name: Titan Medical
description: Titan Medical is a Canadian company based in Toronto, known for its Enos robotic surgical system.

name: Johnson & Johnson MedTech
description: Johnson & Johnson MedTech is a US-based company, providing innovative medical technologies including the Ottava surgical robot.

name: Virtuoso Surgical
description: Virtuoso Surgical is a US-based company in Nashville, Tennessee, known for its Virtuoso single-port surgical system.

name: Rob Surgical
description: Rob Surgical is a Spanish company based in Barcelona, known for its Bitrack robotic surgical system.

name: Revo Surgical
description: Revo Surgical is a South Korean company based in Seoul, known for its Revo-i robotic surgical system.

name: Surgical Science
description: Surgical Science is a Swedish company based in GÃ¶teborg, specializing in medical simulation, including the FlexVR simulator.

name: ForceDimension
description: ForceDimension is a Swiss company specializing in high-precision haptic devices like Sigma and Omega.

name: Haption
description: Haption is a French high-tech company that designs, manufactures, and sells professional quality haptic devices like Virtuoso.

name: Quanser
description: Quanser is a Canadian company based in Markham, providing robot systems and parts, including the HD2 haptic device.

name: Noah Medical
description: Noah Medical is a US-based company in San Carlos, California, developing robotic systems for minimally invasive lung biopsies, such as Galaxy.

name: Stryker
description: Stryker is an American multinational medical technologies corporation based in Kalamazoo, Michigan, known for its Mako SmartRobotics system for joint replacement.

name: Think Surgical
description: Think Surgical is a US-based company in Freemont, California, known for its TMINI orthopedic surgical robot.

name: Curexo
description: Curexo is a South Korean company based in Seoul, engaged in the distribution of medical equipment and known for its Cuvis robotic systems for joint and spine surgery.

name: eCential Robotics
description: eCential Robotics is a French company based in Grenoble, focused on open surgery robotics, seemingly using a Kuka medical arm.

name: AcuSurgical
description: AcuSurgical is a French company based in Montpellier, focused on advanced robotic solutions for vitreoretinal procedures, including the Luca platform.

name: MMI
description: MMI (Medical Microinstruments) is an Italian company based in Calci, known for its Symani surgical system for open microsurgery.

name: RavenII
description: RavenII is a research robotic system developed in the United States, compatible with da Vinci instruments.

name: SuPER
description: SuPER is a research robotic system developed in Canada, which integrates da Vinci S/Si instruments onto a serial manipulator (Kinova).
